text: The 1898–99 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team represented Yale University in intercollegiate basketball during the 1898–99 season. The team finished the season with a 9–2 record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Category:Yale Bulldogs men's basketball seasons Yale Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team
title: 1898–99 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team
